setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox
specific_user_instruction: with focus on the listbox popup, read information about the listbox popup.
output_assertions: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('Favorite Fruit') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (13) is conveyed
